foreignData.name: Verbrannte Ruinen
foreignData.text:
Opfere zwei ungetappte Länder, wenn die verbrannten Ruinen ins Spiel kommen, oder begrabe die Verbrannten Ruinen.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um vier farblose Mana.

name: Scorched Ruins
originalText:
When Scorched Ruins comes into play, sacrifice two untapped lands or bury Scorched Ruins.
oc
T: Add four colorless mana to your mana pool.

rulings.text: If you don’t sacrifice the lands, Scorched Ruins never enters the battlefield — it goes directly to your graveyard.

text:
If Scorched Ruins would enter the battlefield, sacrifice two untapped lands instead. If you do, put Scorched Ruins onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C}.
